# NSSwapLittleIntToHost(_:)

**Function**

Swaps the bytes of a number.

## Declaration

```swift
func NSSwapLittleIntToHost(_ x: UInt32) -> UInt32
```

## Discussion

Converts the little-endian formatted value in `x` to the current endian format and returns the resulting value. If it is necessary to swap the bytes, this function calls [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSSwapInt(_:)] to perform the swap.

## Related Documentation

- **NSSwapBigIntToHost(_:)**: Swaps the bytes of a number.
- **NSSwapHostIntToLittle(_:)**: Swaps the bytes of a number.
